      • Polynomial

        public Polynomial(int[] coefs,
          int[] exps)
        Constructor for Polynomial that accepts matching arrays for the terms
        Parameters:
        coefs - Integer array of the coefficients of each term
        exps - Integer array of the exponents of each term
